FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Have questions? Here are some of the most common questions we receive.
FAQ.faq1_question: What is the difference between the Free and Premium licenses?
FAQ.faq1_answer: The Free plan offers basic features to start your projects, allowing you to view projects as a guest, but without the ability to create or manage your own. The Premium plan unlocks unlimited access to all features, including project creation and management, advanced collaboration, and priority support, ideal for larger teams and projects.
FAQ.faq2_question: Can I use Projectude for SaaS projects?
FAQ.faq2_answer: Yes! Projectude is flexible and can be adapted to manage various types of projects, including Software as a Service (SaaS) development, marketing projects, event planning, and much more.
FAQ.faq3_question: Is it possible to customize the platform's appearance?
FAQ.faq3_answer: Currently, interface customization is limited to light and dark theme options, ensuring a consistent visual experience. We are always working to add more customization options in the future.
FAQ.faq4_question: What is the scope of the support offered?
FAQ.faq4_answer: Community support is available to all users through the Help Center for all plans. Premium subscribers have access to priority email support for quick resolution of doubts and technical problems related to the platform.
FAQ.faq5_question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
FAQ.faq5_answer: We offer a full refund policy for paid plans within the first 7 days after the initial subscription. If Projectude does not meet your expectations, please contact our support to request a refund.

CookiesPolicyPage.title: Projectude Cookie Policy
CookiesPolicyPage.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how the Projectude Platform uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website (www.projectude.com). It details what cookies are, why we use them, and how you can control them.
CookiesPolicyPage.section1Text: Cookies are small text files stored on your browser or device when you visit a website. They serve to recognize your preferences, improve your browsing experience, and collect analytical information.
CookiesPolicyPage.strictlyNecessaryText: These cookies are essential for the platform to function and cannot be disabled. They are used, for example, to:
strictlyNecessaryList: Keep you logged into your account
CookiesPolicyPage.performanceText: Help us understand how users interact with Projectude, allowing us to:
performanceList: Measure number of visits and browsing behavior
CookiesPolicyPage.performanceExample: Example: we use tools like Google Analytics with IP anonymization.
CookiesPolicyPage.functionalityText: Allow the platform to remember your choices to personalize your experience, such as:
marketingList: Show personalized communications about updates or plans
Measure interactions with promotional campaigns (with your consent)
CookiesPolicyPage.section3Text: You can control and/or delete cookies at any time. To do so:
section3List: Browser Settings: Adjust cookie permissions, block or delete saved cookies.
CookiesPolicyPage.section4Text: We may use cookies from third-party services (e.g., Stripe, Firebase, Google) for authentication, payments, or analytics. These cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of these providers.
CookiesPolicyPage.section5Text: This Cookie Policy may be modified periodically to reflect changes in legislation or the platform itself. The updated version will always be published at: www.projectude.com/cookies
CookiesPolicyPage.section6Text: If you have questions or requests regarding the use of cookies, contact our team:
CookiesPolicyPage.consent: By continuing to use Projectude after viewing the cookie notice, you agree to the use as described in this policy.

faq.question: How do I create a new project?
faq.answer: Go to 'My Projects' > click 'Register New Project' > fill out the form with name, cover, status, collaborators, and notes.

faq.question: How do I invite a collaborator?
faq.answer: Go to the 'Collaborators' tab, click 'Invite Collaborator', and send the invitation by email.

faq.question: Is it safe to enter credentials in the project?
faq.answer: Yes. The data is encrypted and you can choose whether collaborators will have access or not.

faq.question: How do I switch between light and dark mode?
faq.answer: Click the sun or moon icon at the top of the interface to switch modes.

faq.question: How does plan payment work?
faq.answer: You can add and manage cards in the Settings > Plans tab. There is a payment history and an option to set a main card.

faq.question: Can I attach files to a project?
faq.answer: Yes. In the project registration or editing form, there is an option to add up to 3 attachments.

steps: Write the comment and set the status.

CriarProjeto.title: How to Create a New Project
content: Go to 'My Projects' in the side menu.
Click the 'Register New Project' button.
Fill out the form with name, cover (optional), initial status.
Add collaborators (optional).
Save the project.

CompartilharProjeto.title: How to Share a Project
content: Open the project you want to share.
Go to the 'Collaborators' tab.
Click 'Invite Collaborator'.
Enter the collaborator's email and set permissions.
Click 'Send Invitation'.
